title: Did Not Receive My lvl up capsule
body: Hello, I have leveled up from 30->31 and received a notification that I have recieved a Champion Capsule. I was excited to finally go past lvl 30 after all these years but when I went to go claim my capsule, it isn't in my loot tab. Can you please help me? Thank you very much

replies.body:
From what I can see on my end, you were given that level 31 capsule on Dec 7th, but you didn't open it until Dec 24th. Seems like you got all the level up rewards you should have, and that capsule gave you...

Champion (Shard): 1 Karma
Champion (Shard): 1 Amumu
Crafting Currency: 90 Blue Essence
